metadata.description: Required: No | Enable accelerated networking on the AVD session hosts.
Required: No | Allow the session hosts to be downsized to a smaller VM size.
Required: Yes | Name of the Application Insights resource.
Required: Yes | Name of the app service plan resource.
Required: No | Zones for the AVD session hosts.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the Azure Blobs private DNS zone.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the Azure Files private DNS zone.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the Azure Queues private DNS zone.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the Azure Tables private DNS zone.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the delegated subnet for the function app.
Required: No | Password for the domain join account in Active Directory Domain Services.
Required: No | Username for the domain join account in Active Directory Domain Services.
Required: No | Name of the domain to join in Active Directory Domain Services.
Required: No | Number of hours to wait before draining a session host.
Required: No | The environment name of the Entra ID tenant for connecting to Microsoft Graph.
Required: No | Choose whether to fix the session host tags.
Required: Yes | Name of the function app resource.
Required: Yes | Name of the network interface resource for the function app.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the private DNS zone for the function app.
Required: Yes | Name of the private endpoint resource for the function app.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the private DNS zone for the SCM endpoint of the function app.
Required: No | URL to the zip file for the function app. Ideally, this ZIP file should be hosted in Azure Blobs in a private container.
Required: No | Resource ID of the compute gallery image definition to use for the session hosts.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the AVD host pool.
Required: Yes | Identity service provider for the AVD session hosts.
Required: No | Enroll the session hosts in Intune. This only applies if the identity service provider is EntraID.
Required: Yes | Name of the key vault resource. This value must be globally unique.
Required: No | Distinguished name of the organization unit to join in Active Directory Domain Services.
Required: Yes | Name of the network interface resource for the key vault.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the private DNS zone for the key vault.
Required: Yes | Name of the private endpoint resource for the key vault.
Required: Yes | Username for the local admin account on the AVD session hosts.
Required: No | Region of the Function App. This does not need to be the same as the location of the Azure Virtual Desktop Host Pool. | Default: Location of the resource group.
Required: No | Resource ID of the Log Analytics Workspace used by Application Insights to monitor the Function App.
Required: No | Offer of the Azure Marketplace image to use for the AVD session hosts.
Required: No | Publisher of the Azure Marketplace image to use for the AVD session hosts.
Required: No | SKU of the Azure Marketplace image to use for the AVD session hosts.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the private DNS zone for the private link scope.
Required: No | Choose whether to replace the AVD session host when a new image version is available.
Required: No | Number of days to wait before replacing the AVD session host when a new image version is available.
Required: No | Security type of the AVD session hosts.
The SKU of the AVD session host OS disk.
Required: No | Number of digits to pad the AVD session host instance number for the resource names.
Required: Yes | Prefix for the AVD session host resource names.
Required: Yes | Resource group name for the AVD session hosts.
Required: Yes | Virtual machine size for the AVD session hosts.
Required: Yes | Location for the AVD session hosts.
Required: No | Deployment prefix for the AVD session host deployments.
Required: No | Name of the diagnostic setting for the storage account resource. This value is only required when a log analytics workspace resource ID is specified.
Required: Yes | Name of the storage account resource. This resource is required for the function app.
Required: Yes | Name of the network interface resource for the storage account.
Required: Yes | Name of the private endpoint resource for the storage account.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the subnet for the AVD session hosts.
Required: No | Tags to apply to the resources.
Required: Yes | Number of AVD session hosts to deploy.
Required: No | Number of days to wait before replacing the AVD session host when a new image version is available.
Required: Yes | Name of the template spec resource.
Required: No | Value used to generate unique names for the deployments. Do not supply a value for this parameter.
Required: No | Name of the user assigned identity to support customer managed keys on the storage account.
Required: Yes | Resource ID of the user assigned identity to support the function app. The resource group name in this value is used as the deployment scope for all resources.

variables.imageReference: [if(empty(parameters('galleryImageId')), createObject('publisher', parameters('marketPlaceImagePublisher'), 'offer', parameters('marketPlaceImageOffer'), 'sku', parameters('marketPlaceImageSku'), 'version', 'latest'), createObject('Id', parameters('galleryImageId')))]
variables.domainJoinObject: [if(equals(parameters('identityServiceProvider'), 'EntraID'), createObject('DomainType', 'EntraID', 'IntuneJoin', parameters('intuneEnrollment')), createObject('DomainType', 'ActiveDirectory', 'DomainName', parameters('domainName'), 'DomainJoinUserName', parameters('domainJoinUserName'), 'ADOUPath', parameters('organizationUnitPath')))]

properties.description: Deploy a resource manager template with the access to the secrets in the Key Vault.
Template Spec for deploying VMs through the AVD Replacement Plan
properties.displayName: AVD Replacement Plan Session Host Template

value.name: _SessionHostParameters
value.value: [string(createObject('AcceleratedNetworking', parameters('acceleratedNetworking'), 'AdminUsername', parameters('localAdminUsername'), 'AvailabilityZones', parameters('availabilityZones'), 'DiskType', parameters('sessionHostDiskType'), 'DomainJoinObject', variables('domainJoinObject'), 'DomainJoinPassword', if(equals(parameters('identityServiceProvider'), 'EntraID'), null(), createObject('reference', createObject('keyVault', createObject('id', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', split(parameters('userAssignedIdentityResourceId'), '/')[2], split(parameters('userAssignedIdentityResourceId'), '/')[4]), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('deploy-key-vault-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.resourceId.value), 'secretName', 'DomainJoinPassword'))), 'ImageReference', variables('imageReference'), 'Location', parameters('sessionHostsRegion'), 'SecurityProfile', createObject('securityType', parameters('securityType'), 'uefiSettings', createObject('secureBootEnabled', true(), 'vTpmEnabled', true())), 'SubnetId', parameters('subnetResourceId'), 'tags', parameters('tags'), 'VMSize', parameters('sessionHostSize')))]

siteConfig.appSettings: [union(createArray(createObject('name', '_AzureEnvironmentName', 'value', environment().name), createObject('name', '_EntraEnvironmentName', 'value', parameters('entraEnvironmentName')), createObject('name', '_SubscriptionId', 'value', subscription().subscriptionId), createObject('name', '_TenantId', 'value', subscription().tenantId), createObject('name', 'APPLICATIONINSIGHTS_CONNECTION_STRING', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), '2020-02-02').ConnectionString), createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage__blobServiceUri', 'value', format('https://{0}.blob.{1}', parameters('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage)), createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage__credential', 'value', 'managedidentity'), createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage__managedIdentityResourceId', 'value', parameters('userAssignedIdentityResourceId')), createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage__queueServiceUri', 'value', format('https://{0}.queue.{1}', parameters('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage)), createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage__tableServiceUri', 'value', format('https://{0}.table.{1}', parameters('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage)), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION', 'value', '~4'), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME', 'value', 'powershell'), createObject('name', 'WEBSITE_LOAD_USER_PROFILE', 'value', '1')), parameters('replacementPlanSettings'))]
